snippet: Senator Kirsten Gillibrand has offered a sensible amendment that would prevent any cuts in food stamps. The Democratic-led Senate should make sure it passes.
abstract: Editorial laments that the version of the farm bill that has emerged from the Senate Agriculture Committee contains $4.5 billion in cuts to the food stamps program over 10 years; urges the Democratic-led Senate to vote in favor of an amendment that would eliminate the cuts.
lead_paragraph: Senator Kirsten Gillibrand has offered a sensible amendment that would prevent any cuts in food stamps. The Democratic-led Senate should make sure it passes.

headline.seo: Food Stamps and the Farm Bill
headline.main: Food Stamps and the Farm Bill
headline.print_headline: Food Stamps and the Farm Bill
